changeSet.author: Venky
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for PreTreatmentMDT Form

changeSet.author: Venky

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Precancerous lesions", "Abnormal findings", "Confirmed malignancy") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PTMDT, Clinical diagnosis");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PTMDT, Clinical diagnosis

changeSet.author: Venky
